questions.stem: The scientist made a significant ________ in his research on renewable energy.
His constant complaining began to ________ on everyone's patience.
The politician delivered a very ________ speech that swayed public opinion.
Despite the initial setback, the team remained ________ about achieving their goal.
She felt a deep sense of ________ after successfully completing the marathon.
The old manuscript was written in a very ________ script that few could decipher.
The company decided to ________ its operations to a less expensive location.
His explanation was so ________ that it left the audience more confused than before.
The ancient ruins were a ________ reminder of a lost civilization.
We need to find a ________ solution to this long-standing conflict.
The artist's use of color was ________, evoking strong emotions in the viewer.
It is important to ________ your sources when writing an academic paper.
The sudden downpour caused a ________ of traffic on the main highway.
She tried to ________ her true feelings, but her trembling hands gave her away.
The company's ________ growth over the last decade has been remarkable.
His ________ behavior at the formal dinner was quite inappropriate.
The desert landscape was characterized by its ________ emptiness.
The judge cautioned the jury not to let personal biases ________ their decision.
After working tirelessly for weeks, he felt completely ________.
The novelist has a remarkable ability to ________ vivid characters in her books.
